website_summaries.verdict: Everything you need to start an organized spice collection, without breaking the bank.
pros: The silver-colored tins hold a surprising amount of spice – more than the typical grocery store spice bottle
The lid easily twists to reveal pour or sprinkle options
The lids close tightly, but are easy enough to remove for refills
The magnetic grip is strong enough to prevent any down sliding
Pre-printed labels for common spices are included, along with a number of blank labels
The low cost is an added bonus
cons: You can't submerge the jars in water to clean them, as water will accumulate between the plastic

customer_reviews.title: These things were great at first
customer_reviews.text: These things were great at first, but as time went on, they became a total chore to open or close. I often have to remove the top almost completely in order to get some of these to twist. Update: A year later, we're throwing out empty tins as we run out of what they held, and going back to the store bought containers. This has to be the biggest failure of a purchase I've made from Amazon. These things are garbage with anything small enough to get between the lid and tin, turning them into an unturnable pain in the ass.
customer_reviews.author: Bray Almini

customer_reviews.title: Work great, holds a significant amount of a spice in each one
customer_reviews.text: We bought two sets and they work great. We used them with this label set:  We were surprised at how much each canister holds. They hold more than most upright spice jars.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal and Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing Way to Store Spices
customer_reviews.text: My family cooks a lot and we had two drawers jammed full of spices and it was always a pain to find them. These magnetic spice tins are amazing. We have them stuck to the side of our fridge and it's such a nice, colorful, off-the-counter way to store them. I don't have to dig through drawers anymore to find what I'm looking for, and it makes me remember that we have spices when I'm cooking something without a specific recipe. We started out by ordering 2 sets, and just purchased a third. They are high-quality, visually appealing, and just all-around awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Great spice rack. Stays in place and has fine holes or a bigger hole on the side of the tin. It doesn't leak if you twist the lid to close the holes but I read the other reviews about placing the tins on the fridge with the fine holes uppermost just to be sure. Lid fits on tightly also. 1 month later and I have changed my review of these tins. The lids are impossible to turn as they get stuck and the only way to get the spice out of the tin is to prise the lid off. These tins were a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Carrots

customer_reviews.title: WON'T OPEN
customer_reviews.text: SO DISAPPOINTED...I purchased these for our camper to save space. They look cute and stick nicely to the magnetic plate I got BUT THEY WILL NOT OPEN! We cannot even use them because we cannot turn the lids to open them up. Wasted my money and time getting them labeled and in the camper.
customer_reviews.author: J Hill

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT stainless steel. The rusted on the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT stainless steel. The rusted on the first wash. They also have sharp edges and I ended up with a very nasty cut just trying to open one of them to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Somethingorother

customer_reviews.title: USELESS! CAPS FIT TO TIGHT TO ACCESS SPICE.
customer_reviews.text: I suspect someone is selling a lot of defective items. They are beautiful and I love the magnets, but these containers are totally useless, as most fit so tight you can't get to the spice. I'm quite disgusted because after you unbox, unwrap, thoroughly wash, and then fill the containers... you need a very strong person in your company if you want to gain access to the spice.
customer_reviews.author: Nebu11a

customer_reviews.title: We love these for our small kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: We love these for our small kitchen with very little storage space! The second set we ordered was very rusted but I had no problem with the return process. I then ordered another second set that was fine. Helpful hint - you can pop the plastic out to wash and dry the tin and plastic properly, and then pop it back in.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaFamily

customer_reviews.title: Defective lid design
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer mentioned, water gets in between the acrylic and metal pieces of the lid and gets trapped there. I sterilized these with hot water before use and the trapped water had caused rust by the next morning. I ordered three packs, so I don't think this was a fluke. I can only imagine that many of the positive reviewers didn't wash these before using them.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: This product listing does not tell you that the lids do not form a good seal. I discovered the cheapness when I washed them before first use. In the picture you will see that there were water bubbles inside the lid between the metal and the plastic. Also, the plastic disk comes out easily. Do not use this if you intend to store spices for any length of time. They aren't much better off than if you stored them in open air, wxcept it will protect them from dust.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Tilly

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Be More Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook, have limited space, and way way way too many spices. These containers work perfectly. I have a pebble-textured refrigerator and was a little worried about their sticking firmly enough to the side, but no problems. And they're cute. One caveat.... when you wash them before use, do not throw the tops into the water. It can be difficult to get rid of all the moisture around the clear top inset. Just wash them one at a time and dry immediately. Other than that, I can't recommend them any more highly. Great space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gal

customer_reviews.title: A perfect solution for organizing your pantry & spices!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these as replacements for an older, similar set that age and wear had rendered difficult to open. These are perfect! We keep these on our refrigerator filled with our commonly used spices - which allows us to skip a pantry visit every time we cook. The lids fasten tightly. Yet, they are easy to remove. If you give them a little 'twist' when closing, it will create a tighter fit and prevent any of the finer ingredients, such as baking soda or corn starch, from leaking out. The package contains two different sets / styles of labels, along with a magnetic measurement conversion chart for your fridge. Overall, a fantastic value and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking The Books

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I did my research! This is the brand and the ones you want to purchase! Each and everyone of these storage containers are perfect! Lids are not too tight and not too loose and magnets are strong. Great label styles, good selection of spices listed and everything you need to organize them. I WILL be ordering more! Update: they are handy but one thing I will add... if you fill them with a fine powder like turmeric, garlic powder, cinnamon and etc. the lids won’t turn to the opening. I have to pry them up/off to clean off the powder to get to the sprinkling. Repeat each time of use. Kind of a nuisance but I will endure!
customer_reviews.author: PMB

customer_reviews.title: Save counter space with these tins
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these tins so that I could share some of my bulk spice purchases with friends. I'm glad I bought two sets of the tins because I fell in love with them. They are easy to use for either pouring, sifting, or scooping your spices. They can be stored by using the magnet and attaching them to the side of your refrigerator, or in my case, to a cookie-sheet (or special wall plate) that can be mounted to the wall; or you can just stack them in the cupboard or on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Tilly Garnett

customer_reviews.title: Spice heaven!
customer_reviews.text: These tins are fantastic: stylish, easy to fill and use, and a super-efficient storage option. When I "lost" my spice drawer to a move, I was stymied on how to create an accessible system for my extensive, and oft-used, spice collection. These genius containers now fill one side of my fridge (I have two 24-canister sets there, with room to spare) where the labels (included in set) are completely visible and organized. The containers have two dispenser options--shake or pour--then twist closed. The magnets are powerful so there's no fear of them falling off or sliding down your storage surface. Can't recommend these enough!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Boat

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited.... major letdown.
customer_reviews.text: One came without the clear window so wasn’t useable. The magnetic backing isn’t very strong, so wasn’t able to fill with more than half to avoid them falling off. The backing was also rounded and crinkled on 4 (so 5 of 12 were unusable) so they never stuck to anything. Some of the tops were also very difficult to get off to fill and I managed to cut my finger on one trying.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good but not forever.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for 5 months in a hot and humid environment. The cannisters are beginning to rust a little around the pouring spouts. Or get blemished were some spices cling to the surface. I still like them, but I'm not sure how long they will last. Will update if they become unusable in too short a time. I do like how convenient it is to pull them off of the side of the fridge. No digging through a cabinet. It would be nice if the had a mixed sizes. They are too small for a large, full jar of spices, and too large for the small size... If that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: ckoz

customer_reviews.title: Solid & convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to save space in our somewhat limited counter and shelve space kitchen. They are well made and intuitively designed with many different applicable labels. I like the see-through tops that rotate to dispense spices. The accompanying mounting racks are easy to mount and are flexible in their design [mine are mounted on the wall behind the range]. With the magnetic container bottoms they can even be conveniently mounted on a nearby refrig or freezer. If I needed more, I'd re-purchase this item. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Love the Labels
customer_reviews.text: Tins are great, we ordered them for our RV, decided to return the metal backing sheet and just keep tins. The 8 tins I needed fit perfectly on the vent hood of the range in our trailer. The best part of this product is the labels. It came with multiple options which I loved. I labeled the ones in the trailer and then took the other set and relabeled the jars I already had in my kitchen. Tins are very nice and I enjoy the sliding lid to sprinkle or pour out what I need . Couldn't be happier, great product. Ohh and no spills at all in the RV going over bumpy dirt roads!
customer_reviews.author: lisa w.

customer_reviews.title: Feel very cheap. Not airtight.
customer_reviews.text: Spice containers need to be airtight, otherwise the spices lose their freshness. These containers are poorly made -- you can tap the plastic transparent cover and it moves back and forth very easily. Not even close to an airtight seal.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, total fail!
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller magnetic set that I loved. Time to make it larger, and this set is the perfect size. Especially like the extensive set of labels that came with it. Mounted it with Velcro on our kitchen tiled wall and it looks perfect. So great to buy more obscure spices in the bulk section of our local grocery store, and buy just enough to fill the container. Packaged perfectly and arrived quickly. Update: finally giving up these! Most of them just won’t twist to dispense. A few work fine. At one point, opened them all, made sure the edges were clear of spice, put back on. Didn’t help at all. Great concept, but total failure.
customer_reviews.author: SallyM

customer_reviews.title: great containers
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to use. I got them to get the spices out of the drawer. Was tired of lifting each one up to read the label. I got to sets as I have a lot of different spices. The lids fit fine on all of mine. I did order to metal sheets sold on amazon to hold the spices on. I placed them into my pantry which I recently had redone. Now it is easier to read the labels. Even though I have given it a 5 star rating. It would have been nice if they had included a pen to write on the black labels. I would get these again.
customer_reviews.author: W. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: You could probably do better.
customer_reviews.text: I love the labels and the ability to make your own labels. My biggest criticism is trying to actually pull the lid off or turn it to open. It is okay with some seasonings but with ones like salt where the grain is very fine, it causes too much traction to turn. It has become quite a headache. If there is any other option, I would probably go with that versus this.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: The tins arrived very well packaged, with no dents or damage and the product looks very high quality! The lids are secure but not too tight so I've been using both the slots on the side and removing the lids to dispense the spices with no issues. The magnetic at the bottom makes them stick to my metal spice rack but not to the point where they are hard to pull out. I tested it on the fridge and they stick pretty well too. I also loved the extra little things I got. We've been using the conversion measures fridge magnet quite a lot. I'm very happy I chose this set!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Silva

customer_reviews.title: I reccommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product frees up my cabinet space by hanging out on the side of the fridge. Each cell holds exactly one regular sized spice or herb container bought from the store (can seep out the holds once it gets to the top prior to putting the lid on). I’ve ordered a total of 3 or 4 packs of 12. Out of all of them, only one arrived broken and irreparable. A few of them have lids that are loose; I just put lighter seasonings in the and gave the lid a little squeeze on all four sizes in hopes to avoid a spill. Hasn’t happened yet. So far they’ve all worked really well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tins for dried herbs
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of tins for my seasonings/dried herbs and of course, a major space saver. I do agree that the magnets are a bit week. However, I’m only using them for seasonings/dried herbs and placing the tins on top of the (45 degree angled) stove exhaust vent. It’s perfect there, out of the way yet well within reach. They also work just fine on the side of my refrigerator. Both surfaces, no slippage. The tins can hold the following amount - McCormick Gourmet All Natural Cilantro, 0.43 oz McCormick Gourmet All Natural Tarragon, 0.37 oz McCormick Italian Seasoning, 0.75 oz I’m definitely happy with my new tins.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Innovative
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to buy some Indian spice containers and just happened to stumble upon these. I thought I'd give them a try and I am very happy that I did. I opened up space in the cupboard and drawers because now I have the spices on the side of the refrigerator. In the past, I would forget about my various spice packs and some of the spices would spill out inside the drawers and create a mess. Now, I use my spices a lot more because they are on hand and where I could see them. My only suggestion is to make some of the containers with smaller holes also so that not so much spice comes out.
customer_reviews.author: seagypsy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Super space saver!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! Space saver and they look nice. :) I’ve had mine for a couple years now and they still look brand new, so I’d say they’re pretty durable. They’re super easy to use and the magnets are strong. I haven’t had any issues with mine at all. I never realized how much space those dumb spice bottles took up until I got these and cleared them all out! Haha. Such a great idea. Great space saver, especially for small kitchens / small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these for spice storage. I was able to open a whole drawer which previously was reserved for spice containers. Now, I have two sets of these on my fridge and can refill at any time I need! I liked that it came with stickers to label each jar so that the spices are easy to find, and everything matches. Just be careful with storage because if the jars aren't closed properly, they will spill out the holes in the sides. It is also a little harder to get the spices to pour out evenly through the holes on the side when they are open. Overall would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected !!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got them I was so excited , filled them up and put them on the side of my fridge and I even ordered more to fill up, until one fell and knocked the others all down like a domino effect. Not only did it happen one time but now like 10 times. The magnetic part on the bottom is cheaply made and does not stay put. I wish I never had invested my money in these cheap containers!!! so much for keeping them in alphabetical order , they fall at least once a day and I just put them back up wherever.
customer_reviews.author: paula hancock

customer_reviews.title: Great little spice jars
customer_reviews.text: I like to buy bulk spices from the grocery store and had a ton of those little plastic bulk bags clogging up my spice cabinet, so I bought these. Great solution. I like that they come with two options for labels (round black and white ones or clear with black lettering), and that the lids have shakey holes or a pour hole that you can swivel to use, or close. Great purchase, will definitely be back for more when I get more spicies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing. Out of the way.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. So so aesthetically pleasing. Up off the counter and out of the way. Comes with clear and black labels. Also comes with a magnet that has comparisons of measurements. Magnet on the tins are strong. Lids stay on very well. They hold a full jar of spice. And have a pour spout and a shaker spout. The holes on the shaker are small though, so I won’t be able to use for all spices. That’s the only thing I don’t like so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Redemsky

customer_reviews.title: Nice tins!
customer_reviews.text: I finally switched all my spices over to uniform tins and I’m quite pleased with the new aesthetic. These hold nicely to the side of my refrigerator and stay closed. There is some leakage when you turn the lids to the dispensing side, but nothing crazy. I like that the lids have a pour and sprinkle option and the set comes with a ton of ready-to-use labels. The set also included a common measurement conversion chart-nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Wampus

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly useful!
customer_reviews.text: I have an ever expanding spice collection, so my spice drawer is full to bursting. These mag vessels are such a good addition! I use them mostly for the quick grab needs -- salt, pepper, sugar, plus a number of spices that I reach for often, like garam masala. They're right there on the door of my refrigerator -- so fast, so easy. I used to keep quick need spices in little ramekins on my counter, but these are so much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Page

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful, I love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and exactly as depicted. I ordered 24, and am going to get a few more to accommodate all my spices and herbs. I have more cabinet space now since I don't have so many bottles of spices in them. It is so easy to see all your spices and herbs when displayed so neatly and organized on the side of the refrigerator. The kids fit perfectly on every single container, and the magnetic bottoms are strong enough to hold even the most full, heaviest contents.
customer_reviews.author: EarthGurl

customer_reviews.title: so happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This set of spice tins is awesome. Fits perfectly on the side of my fridge and leaves much needed counter space open. I am still able to open my cabinets as they are slim enough not to block them from opening all the way. Comes with more labels than you can imagine. Also includes the magnetic kitchen measurements chart you see next to them. Highly recommend this product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing spices.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. My spice cupboard was a mess and I wasn't sure what to do. I ordered 2 sets of these and got everything organized. The lids fit snug. The magnets are plenty strong. I used the round labels and there is enough space around them that you can see how much spice is in the cannister. They were here way before expected. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K.kayH

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this spice tins. I was so tired of my cluttered spice cabinet and was looking for a spice rack, with no real place to put it, then saw these. I had fun filling them and putting on my fridge they look really sodphisticated and my cabinets are much cleaner. They stick great. What a clever idea! My daughter wants a set. I will get my daughter n law a set for Christmas. It is a Unique useful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: The spice management system you didn't even know you needed!
customer_reviews.text: I had a wonderful wall mounted spice set that kept everything close at hand for cooking. Then I moved to a house with a kitchen with ceramic tiled walls. Forget mounting those spice racks! My wife found this wonderful set and I love it so much I went back to order another dozen containers. Now I can keep my spices near on the side of my refrigerator, adding space that was wasted. All my spices alphabetized in little containers that with a small twist can be set to sprinkle or pour as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: My New Spoce Rack
customer_reviews.text: I took an old 7 up bottle carrier ,cleaned it, and made slits in each box. I then cleaned my containers,dried them,and placed the spice label on each. They were then filled with the appropriate spice and placed in the wooden carrier. The completed product now sits on my kitchen counter for use whenever I should need spices. I have received many compliments about my spice rack and wanted to share it with you. The containers are sturdy,very attractive, and I love them. Would not hesitate to purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After giving the containers a good soak and rinse, I happily filled up all 24 spice containers and then arranged them alphabetically on my fridge. I love the 2 pouring options to either sprinkle or tap out larger amounts into a measuring spoon. These are delightful and the pre-made labels were lovely. The only issue I had is that after washing them, water got trapped between the clear plastic and the metal, but I just had to leave them out to dry for a couple of days to let the water evaporate as there was no way to dry it with a towel. Still 5 stars though for quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Cenva

customer_reviews.title: Lids get stuck
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. More for decoration. They do not hold a lot of the spices that I use frequently so I am always refilling them. Magnets are not super strong and they sometimes slide down the refrigerator. Make sure you close the lid before you put it back! I have had spices fall out from forgetting to do it. The biggest annoyance is the spices get trapped in the lid and they are sometimes very hard to turn. Salt is the worst as it absorbs moisture and swells. I gave up trying to turn it and it's just a decoration now. I use the one in the cabinet. I will buy the glass jars next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I downsized from a house to an apartment and needed a space saving solution for my large spice collection. These magnetic containers made functional use of the side of the refrigerator for all my spices. I love that there were also clear labels to write my own spices on. I just used a damp cloth to wipe out the containers and lids and made sure they were dry before filling. No spillage with common sense placement of the lids.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Nice containers
customer_reviews.text: I loved this for storage space.. It did free up a cabinet so I can utilize it for kitchen storage. However, the cases were not as big as I would have liked them to be. The reason I gave this a 4 star instead of a 5 star is because some of the containers made a pop noise when you put the lid on like it was secure and the lid would not easily fall/pop off. Most of them did not and the lids can easily come right off...
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Cimilluca

customer_reviews.title: Best deal. Vomes with lots of goodies!
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 indi individual spice jars like this from Kroger. My daughter wanted some. So when I spotted the box at a real steal of a price on Amazon knew I had to get her one. I got her them and she is so happy with them.magnetically they cling to the fridge saving her space and time. And they come with a nice assortment of lables and goodies. Very good product for money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Baugh

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months of use, we're looking for something else
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get more room in our spice cabinet by moving them to these containers. It took a little maneuvering to open them sometimes but nothing too bad. Then the more you use them, even with wiping after use, the harder they were to open. We tried paraffin wax and olive oil to try to grease the track safely but nothing worked. Now we're both to the point we dread getting the spices so these are getting pitched. I'm hoping I can find a twisting lid with the same concept because these are about to get thrown against a wall out of frustration.
customer_reviews.author: CoveGirl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of these and loved them so much I ordered a second set. They stay great on the refrigerator and covers do not come off when you pull them off the fridge.. a couple of the covers were a little loose but if you give the bottom a slight squeeze it’s perfect. I would definitely recommend them to anyone who wants to save counter or cupboard space!
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE - The Magnetic Spice Tins!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY Love these Magnetic Spice Tins, I ordered 3 Sets. I love to cook and needed something that required LESS Storage Space in my Kitchen, My Husband Built me the Spice Rack and attached the Metal Plates that hold the containers. The Magnetic on the backs of the Tins is STRONG and holds very well to the Metal Plates, even with your spice tins completely full. If your looking for something Unique, Space Saving and Just Lovely to look at, BUY these Tins, they are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Sun Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love my spice tins!  Magnets work well. Black lettering of the spice labels is hard to see.
customer_reviews.text: Love my spice tins! Magnets work well. Two openings for sprinkling or pouring...or take lid off for pinching. The only two things that I say needs improvement is that there should be a mark where the opening is so you know where to turn to get to the opening. The other suggestion is for the lettering on the convenient spice name stickers be white outlined in black. The lettering is all black, so against the clear surface and dark background, the lettering is hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Some are difficult to twist-open
customer_reviews.text: The ones we decided to use for salt and pepper (of the dozen) were nearly impossible to twist open. It's so much easier to just use a salt shaker, or pepper grinder. The ones that do twist like they were designed to are OK. It just seems like a poor design overall. There is no indication where the opening is on the bottom, so you have to turn and turn to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Dogg-Man

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I didnt think I would like them as much as I have I wish there were more in them! They are so convenient and durable! I thought maybe they would slid down my fridge by making them heavier with stuff in them but absolutely not! They truly are a great thing to have when you have little space and they are modern and elegant looking! Definitely recommend these to anyone - have gotten a lot of compliments already. I havent had them long so I do hope they will remain durable but till now I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to put up.
customer_reviews.text: Received our tins and immediately followed the directions of wiping them out with a damp cloth and drying them. After we made sure they were dry we moved our spices from the cabinet into the tins. We love them. We actually used the wall plates and attached them to the inside of our pantry door. Before we knew it all 24 tins were full and sitting in place on the door. We ordered another set to finish everything up. Getting the paper off of the adhesive was the hardest part. We will definitely recommend these to others
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitchen drawers!
customer_reviews.text: I had an entire shelf in my pantry devoted to seasonings and I was still running out of room somehow. Growing up my mom had similar containers to these and when I saw them I knew they’d be perfect for the small drawers above my microwave. I ended up ordering the 24 pack and the 12 pack to be able to fill them all, my shelf is looking much more manageable with just spice blends and back stock of the other spices. I also alphabetized the spices in the drawers and it’s made cooking soooo much more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these more than I do. I hand washed them and dried them, but on 4 of them I found rust along the rim under the plastic window. Another issue is the magnetic bottom. They stick to the metal when there are spices in them, but not very well. If you bump one you run the risk of having it dislodge and hit the ones below it, which can knock them off the rack. I do like the looks of them and the way they display my spices, but I'm going to have to run a velcro strip behind them and use velcro to make them more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok. 4 of the containers are nearly impossible to open and close so those are unusable. Wish I could get 4 more to replace them. I even tried to oil them but nothing helps. The size is ok, although I had one medium size spice that didn’t fit in the container so I had to keep the container for later. They look nice and the magnetic part totally works. Just sucks that some of them won’t open well
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation.
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered the spice kit and we needed a second one so I ordered it and placed it IN the cupboard on the door so it is out of the way, gives us more space inside and helped rid the counter of clutter. I'm a messy cook! I shared a photo of the project with my bro-in-law and he responded, "I want one of those". I ordered him one and he is waiting for it to arrive. Love the product. Love the ease with which it installed. It is a great idea. The first set is on the side of my microwave. F. Geoffrey Samora
customer_reviews.author: f. geoffrey samora

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I'm height challenged at 5'2" (if I stretch) and I was always having a hard time finding the spices I wanted to use in my cabinet without having to enlist the assistance of my 6'2" husband. These are attached to the side of my fridge and make it very easy to see what I have, how much I have, and use. They look nice too.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Lids are too tight - do t work
customer_reviews.text: They are just the right the size and I was able to organize my spices. BUT the lids are very hard to turn once they are on. I have had to pry them off and rub a soap bar or vegetable oil around the top so I can turn the lid. I think they will get better over time but, right now very, very tight. They are getting worse!!! I would like to return them. There’s definitely something wrong with the design or the material used to make them. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: H Potter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I had a lazy susan with all my spices on the counter. I don't have a lot of counter space to begin with, and with all the various spice jars stuffed into the lazy susan, it was jumbled and messy looking, and taking up much needed space. So I bought 2 sets of these tins and now have all of my spices on the side of my fridge. Out of the way, and much neater looking.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Keller

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT clean the caps with water. Plastic see though cover is not glued properly
customer_reviews.text: Looks cheaper in real. Sticks well. Possible rust if you clean the caps with water since water traps between the cap and cap’s see through plastic cover. It was not glued properly. Check video( apologies for the background dishwasher noise) .Keeping them anyway .
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Like many others have said, the idea behind this product is amazing, but it failed on the execution. I cannot turn or open the tins. I am super annoyed. I recently bought this product, and at first I didn’t have any issues. Few months after, and like I just said, i cannot even access my spices. I am in the middle of preparing a cake, and I have no access to my cinnamon. I’ll have to wait until my husband comes to see if he can force open the tin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great magnetic spice tins
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of spices and was tired of searching for them in my spice cabinet. I ordered this stainless steel magnetic set from Talented Kitchen and could not be more pleased. They were packaged with care and arrived quickly. I have them on the side of my refrigerator and they come off easily and hold great. Comes with 12 tins with openings to pour or shake, 2 label options, and a magnetic Kitchen measurement conversion chart. I will be ordering a second set soon for the rest of my spices.
customer_reviews.author: betware

customer_reviews.title: great space saving spice rack
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for our motorhome. I put it up using 3M velcro strips for non-perminent easy removal if needed. I am very happy with the ease of installation, quality and capacity. This freed up a cabinet in the motorhome and storage is precious. I did read reviews before purchasing and paused after reading a couple negative ones. I am very glad I decided to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mecher

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these tins to supplement some from another manufacturer--we just had too many spices for the containers on hand. These tins were pretty much identical to the others we had on hand, an important feature in my opinion, since I like things to match. I was also pleased by the labels--two different kinds--included with the tins. My only suggestion for the seller is to include labels with a white background instead of a clear background. I ended up using the black circular labels primarily because it would have been difficult to read the labels with black text without a white background. Super minor issue however; overall, I was very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Frees up SO MUCH SOACE
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! Each tin can hold an entire typical spice jar’s worth of product, they stay fresh, and I love the way the lids fit and are able to rotate to shake or pour the product. I actually need to buy more because I did not get enough to completely transfer my entire spice cabinet. So satisfying to be able to see all of my spices at one glance.
customer_reviews.author: Lisanne Eads

customer_reviews.title: Durable, just like the listing/reviews
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews before purchasing and I think I made the right call. Twelve tins was more than enough for the spices that I frequently use. They have stayed on the side of my fridge w/ no issues and they are easy to use while cooking. They also come with a wide array of labels. I was pleasantly surprised that they had all of the labels I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite kitchen improvements!
customer_reviews.text: I have al my spices at one glance, on the side of my fridge that faces my range. I used to have a shelf in an organizer and I could take minutes to find what I was looking for. They seem small, but they hold an entire normal sized bottle of spices. I needed 3 sets to hold them all which was a bit pricey, but worth it. My food tastes soooo much better because while I'm cooking I can look at all my spices and be inspired of what to add to make the dish better.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Callahan

customer_reviews.title: When a simple product is done very well
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't think a simple thing like this would impress me, but this is what happens when a company puts a little extra something into their product. The tins are simple enough, although I didn't realize they're basically shakers with 2 hole sizes. What I liked is that they came with two sets of spice labels, one clear and the other black, for about 120 different spices. I liked the blackboard style ones but ended up using the clear because it's easier to see inside the tin. There were some write in labels too. It also came with a nice magnetic conversion chart. Everything was individually wrapped and I appreciated that care was taken into their presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome space saver, but capacity could be bigger
customer_reviews.text: I'm huge on having spices around the house, but we just downsized and I needed this space saver. I also love to make my own spices and mixes, which means I have a ton. I love this idea. It's super modern and fun. The sticker labels are awesome. I do kind of wish the capacity of the tins was a bit larger, because like I said, I have so many large quantities and I like to make my own. But they're still really cool and nice to have for spices I don't have a lot of or spices I don't use a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Good Concept---Poorly made/ defective
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, but received a defective product. My product was not air tight. I carefully cleaned product with soap and water only to find that the water leaked through the plastic in the top lid. Also, plastic came off completely for three of the 12 lids. Some of the containers were also slightly dented. The ones that work, work well. I love these and wish they were not so poorly made. May try to buy again to see if I get lucky with some tins that are not damaged. I wish there were better quality magnetic tin options with the clear top.
customer_reviews.author: July

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My spice cupboard was getting full, and unorganized, I had spices I didn’t know I had. These nice tins make life easier and neater, I want to get a magnetic backsplash to put them on, in the meantime, they are on my stove hood. If you twist the lid, you can pour your spice without taking off the lid.
customer_reviews.author: K. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable way to organize your spices
customer_reviews.text: I love these. These are the perfect size to replace the small to average size spice containers. They’re not large enough for slightly larger than average ones. They work and look great. Be sure to align the opening in the lid between the pour and sprinkle options on the jar and place the label so that these are at the top. I used to buy multiples of spices because I couldn’t find them when I was looking for them. This has solved that problem and now my spices are easily accessible on the fridge. I will definitely be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: PollyAnna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to save space and great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new spice tins. I’m saving so much room by getting them off my counter and the magnets are strong enough to hold them firmly on any magnetic surface! Will be ordering more because I love to cook and need plenty of spices for my recipes! Wish I had known about them years ago!!! Thank you so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable beautiful perfection!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect space saver! They look so much better than the photo so don't let the stop you from ordering. Got rid off all the bottles taking up unnecessary room in my metal pantry, now they are on the side in easy reach and the dispenser part, shake, pour or just take the lid off to use a measuring spoon. Can't say enough ordered more for my craft room!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Magyarosi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find my spices now!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this item! Finally a perfect way to store spices.. I always dreaded digging for spices in my cabinet now I just look for the label on the tin on the side of my fridge and quicker than a wink I have my spice in hand 👍...I only wish I’d have found these little gems ages ago!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn R Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Best containers ever!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that comes over raves about how these look! I love the fact that I can sprinkle, pour or open the top and measure my spices with ease. They are easy to remove from the metal sheet but hold tight. I have one full to the brim with salt, which is really heavy, and it's holding so well. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: K Croley

customer_reviews.title: Works good for little kitchens
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for the 4 is if you put any salt or garlic (humidity sensitive) spice, the top rusts shut and you can't spin it to open the holes. Oft time i spill spices when putting them back on the fridge cause they are open, but that's my fault. They worked well for lack of kitchen cabinets
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: perfect spice containers
customer_reviews.text: I keep these on the side of my fridge & I love having my spices where I can easily see & access them, and know when I need more. The lids are great, but be careful what you put in them, for example, cloves react with the metal & it gets sticky/weird, but because they are round you can still get the container open.
customer_reviews.author: H. Forrey

customer_reviews.title: Great set, minor improvements could be made
customer_reviews.text: These spice containers do the job. I bought some, liked them so much I've gotten more. I'm up to 3 sets of them I did notice some of the magnets are a little weaker than others, but that's not a major issue, I just moved those ones to where internal fridge components were at to increase the ability to grab on. They could also be a little larger, but they'll store nearly all of a standard spice jar.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great spice storage!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! Each tin holds a large bottle of spice (not the oversized bottles of garlic salt or seasoned salt). Easy to wash and dry before use. Just be careful when rotating the lids before placing on fridge. There are pour and shake holes in lids. I didn't "close" one carefully and had garlic powder on the counter. All my guests at Thanksgiving loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Happy

customer_reviews.title: I'm very much wishing I'd bought the more expensive glass jars. And now I have to.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so badly to like these. But if you bump into one is like dominoes are all going to fall off your refrigerator. My biggest complaint are the lids will get stuck on and you cannot remove it. Not even my six-foot-three husband can remove these things. So now I have half of them that have to be kept open so that I can use in. Which means my advice is aren't kept fresh. I'm basically going to have to reorder the more expensive product. And throw these away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good neat product
customer_reviews.text: tidy. They keep the spices neat and available and save drawer space for us. The magnet is a good strength. Drawbacks: smallish capacity, labels are hard to read. Some of the spices get in the "threads" of the lid and then the jars are hard to open, as there is little to grip. Be sure you put the labels on with the shaker-openings pointed up! UPDATE AFTER 1 YEAR: I still like my 48 tins, but have had some corrosion/rust. which has led us to discard some. They do fall off the frig occasionally, causing an avalanche in our case, but its manageable.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to free up some space in my cabinets. I have them on the side of my refrigerator and they are so convenient. No more trying to stand on tip toes and taking out ten other spice bottles to find the one I'm looking for. These are so easy to grab and the tops are easy to open. I love them so much I ordered a second set. Try them, you won't be sorry. Now I'm thinking of all the other stuff I can put in these too!
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Schreiner

customer_reviews.title: Not food safe or friendly!
customer_reviews.text: These have a great design in respect to storage capacity, but you can’t actually keep food or spices in these because you cannot properly wash and dry the lids. The lids allow water to seep under the plastic cover, and it is impossible to reach to dry. Then, the result is an odor, nasty colored residue, and unsafe spices. Maybe these would work for non-edible items, but to list them as a spice storage solution is absolutely dangerous in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: LambGlam

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tools!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! Bought 2 sets...still need at least one more set. It is so easy to grab them off the fridge when needed!!! I have them in rows on the fridge and it works great for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickijh2

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these spice tins! The magnets are really strong and it holds to the fridge with no problem. They're larger than I expected and can hold the same amount as a full spice bottle (the tall ones!) They also provide 2 different sets of spice labels so you can pick what matches your decor best. There are 6 pages worth of spice label types to chose from and some blank ones you could write your own spice name on if it's not provided. I'd highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Don Schrieber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I like to buy bulk spices as they are cheaper and often fresher. These tins were super easy to fill, label (PLENTY of labels, with blanks for your non-typical american spices... Indian masalas particularly) and attach to a plain piece of metal next to my sink (to keep away from the heat of the stove). Shipping was fast, product arrived exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to these I can store my spices in a drawer out of the light preserving their freshness. Set comes with preprinted stick on labels that fit on the tops. Incredible variety of spice and herb labels. Each can holds a standard size jar of spices. Lids can be twisted to shake, pour or removed to scoop. They are of good quality metal that I expect to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Work great! But... pricey.
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Pretty expensive though.... freed up a lot of room in our cupboards and we put our spices on our fridge now. Didn't give them five stars because: 1. They are expensive 2. The lids slide off very easily, almost too easily. you have to be careful when pulling them off the fridge because if you pull by the lid it will easily slide off and you will have a giant mess. But the magnets were surprisingly strong... they don't look very strong but we haven't had any spices fall off the fridge yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: Great containers
customer_reviews.text: These containers are just the right heights to fit into the 5-inch IKEA kitchen drawers and the lids with the move very easily. If I had the tins on a magnetic board on a wall, they also would look very attractive. The two kinds of container labels were a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Crum

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, with choices of labels, and have already about doubled my storage in one spice drawer. I hope to get them installed on the tins in a cabinet soon, and expect that to create even more space. Update: I have three sets and my daughter loved them, so I just got two for her.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryln52

customer_reviews.title: I wasn’t thrilled, but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put our spices in. They are large and roomy, but they’re too large to put on my refrigerator. They’re just too deep, IMO. I had to trash a couple of them because water got stuck between the plastic in the lid and the metal part after I hand-washed them and they rusted. In hindsight, I soaked them, and that was probably their undoing. If you get these, I would suggest just using damp cloths to clean them. The lids don’t all fit securely either.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Runion

customer_reviews.title: Organization made easy
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with a jam packed spice drawer for years now. I finally decided to treat myself to this set. So glad I did. I started with two sets and loved them so much that I added two more sets. The lids are very convenient and simple to open, yet fit snugly. It's so nice to have everything organized and at my fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie Svanoe

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i was looking for. they magnet directly to a separate magnet board i bought and they stick to it really good but are also very easy to remove. the lid turns and you can sprinkle seasonings easily. also came with a bunch of labels and a bunch of blank circles to write your own labels. i highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had a magnetic board up with old tins and magnets I glued on myself. After about 7 years the magnets were all falling down, the lids were rusting to the bottoms so I decided to upgrade. The magnetic bottoms, the slightly larger capacity and the easy lids with shaker and pour spouts are sooooo nice. I just ordered a second set to put more spices in a different door.
customer_reviews.author: madcanvases

customer_reviews.title: The BEST way to store spices in a motorhome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Living in a RV I am always looking for space saving ideas. I have very limited pantry space so my spices were always not in sight and easily available. I read many reviews before purchasing these spice tins. I ordered 2 packs and washed the tins carefully not to let water set in the lids and dried them well before transferring my spices. I was concerned about the effectiveness of the magnetic bottom, but they are stronger than I thought!! They hold very well and even look good on my fridge until I receive the wall base. I love them so much I just ordered another 12 pack.
customer_reviews.author: DebiM

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly, they're inexpensive but not cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much for $16, but what I did get I was very happy with. The magnets are enough to hold up one of these things completely stuffed to the brim with something heavy like salt, and it'll stay right there. If you screw up applying the label, it gently peels off and resticks very easily. They're compact and one of your typical seasoning jars from the supermarket will dump directly into these without needing to store/throw away any extra. Lots of labels, I didn't have to hand-write anything at all. All in all, can definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MedCityMoto

customer_reviews.title: Should read the directions:-)
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they look, line up, stick well to the metal, and they are much handier now!!! The packaging was perfect and I was so happy with product. Only downside is how they turn... my kids and I have a hard time turning them. Powders only need a half of 1 hole in order to prevent over pour. Often the powder creates too much friction to line up the holes easily ... don’t think you can engineer around that problem without changing the design substantially. I didn’t read the note about avoiding submersion before cleaning the lids... don’t make that mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K.

customer_reviews.title: I really like these containers
customer_reviews.text: I really like these containers they stick upside down under and over my camper stainless steel counter top The containers contain a full regular bottle of spice a big and holes opening to shake little out or a lot I put the stickers on et voila! so it's perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Tanya C Dagenais

customer_reviews.title: Good magnet, great look
customer_reviews.text: This product looks exactly like it does from the pictures. the magnets on the back of the jars work excellent oh, and the templates it comes with also I have a good hold. Sometimes the Lord seem like they want to come off easily though oh, but it is not a big enough problem to lower it from five stars. Great product, will be buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: Shori Gerardot

product_meta.title: 12 Magnetic Spice Tins & 2 Types of Spice Labels, Authentic by Talented Kitchen. 12 Storage Spice Containers, Window Top w/Sift-Pour. 113 Clear & 126 Chalkboard Stickers. Rack Magnetic On Refrigerator
feature_bullets: AUTHENTIC TALENTED KITCHEN MAGNETIC SPICE TINS + 2 TYPES OF SPICE LABEL SETS INCLUDED + MAGNETIC KITCHEN CONVERSION CHART, THE MOST COMPLETE SET ON AMAZON: The magnetic spice tin stays securely in place so they are easy to get to, put away, and always convenient and organized.

MAGNETIC SPICE CONTAINERS with AMAZING VALUE: 12 metal tins, 2 types preprinted Labels & a magnetic conversion chart included. Each container measures 2.5" diameter x 2" high, 3-ounce. With convenient see-through lid with magnetic backing

EXTRA! MAGNETIC KITCHEN CONVERSION CHART & TWO DIFFERENT TYPES OF SPICE LABELS: Magnetic kitchen conversion chart with useful information at your fingertips. 113 Clear PVC Spice Labels and 126 Chalkboard Spice Labels included in every set. The 96 most common spice names stickers and 17 blank stickers to write you own and more on each set.

MAGNETIC SPICE RACK is a way to ORGANIZE YOUR SPICES: The tins feature clear lids for easy identification of contents and feature a sift and pour design. These storage containers have a magnetic backing, so they will attach to any flat metal surface, including most appliance or refrigerator doors. We recommend to keep them away from continuous steam (kitchen range). BEST CLEANING PRACTICE Before first use, we recommend hand-wash each tin with a damp cloth and hand-dry them right after.

BEST SELLER MAGNETIC SPICE CONTAINERS with 2 PREPRINTED SPICE LABEL TYPES: PVC CLEAR SET: transparent PVC material w/black fonts to maximize contrast. Back adhesive. Sticker size: 1.5x0.5", rectangular with round corners. BLACK CHALKBOARD SPICE LABEL SET: 126 black chalkboard label. 96 preprinted spice names stickers + 18 blank stickers to write your own (reusable) + 6 numbers + 6 pantry names. Chalkboard vinyl material with large white lettering. Back adhesive. Sticker size: round 1.5” diameter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,817 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
